key_risks: Intense competition from traditional packaging companies and new entrants offering alternative materials
Fluctuations in raw material costs and supply chain disruptions
Regulatory risks from changes in environmental regulations or packaging standards
Heavy reliance on the e-commerce sector, making it vulnerable to shifts in online retail trends or economic downturns
controversies: Criticism regarding the environmental impact of paper-based packaging, including deforestation and energy-intensive production processes
environmental_issues: Environmental drawbacks of paper-based packaging, such as deforestation and energy-intensive production processes
social_issues: Commitment to sustainability and ESG goals, including reducing greenhouse gas emissions and using recycled materials
governance_issues: Financial health concerns due to rising costs, supply chain disruptions, and recent refinancing transaction impacting debt profile
